approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

burnFor.description: Burns tokens on behalf of a specified owner.

approveFor.description: Approves a spender to withdraw a specific amount from a specified owner.

addAllowanceIfNeeded.description: Adds allowance if needed for a specified spender.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

setExecutionOperator.description: Sets an execution operator with an enabled/disabled status.

setSuperOperator.description: Sets a super operator with an enabled/disabled status.

paidCall.description: Makes a paid call to a target address with specified amount and data.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender and makes a call to a target address with specified data.

approveAndExecuteWithSpecificGasAndCharg.description: Approves and executes a transaction with specific gas and charges for it.

executeWithSpecificGas.description: Executes a transaction with specific gas parameters.

transferAndChargeForGas.description: Transfers tokens and charges for the gas used.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining allowance for a spender from a specified owner.

getExecutionAdmin.description: Returns the current execution admin address.

isExecutionOperator.description: Checks if a specified address is an execution operator.

isSuperOperator.description: Checks if a specified address is a super operator.
